messages.message: Map tiles will be requested from https://arcgis.com. No radiation data will leave your device, but requests for map tiles encompassing the measurements will be made to this service. {1}

message.p: Your custom arcgis key starting with '{1}' will be used to request map tiles.
An invalid arcgis key was specified in arcgis_key.txt, so the built-in key will be used.

messages.message: Will use user-specified arcgis key, beginning with '{1}' to request maps with.
There was a arcgis_key.txt file, but it did not contain a valid key
